skillTree.localised_description: If a Shaman wants to get especially sneaky an' nasty fast, he needs an especially growly Wolf.

effects.description: Mount: Giant Wolf

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: This enormous, revolting Arachnarok Spider shrine upon which the Shaman is borne forces even the branches of nearby trees to twist in revulsion at its diabolical passing.

effects.description: Mount: Arachnarok Spider (Catchweb Spidershrine)
Cooldown: -10% to all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -25% for all spells

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: A Squig is an unconventional mount, but survivors say it has a certain charm.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description:
Ten Goblins? Inconvenient.
	A hundred? Alarming.
	A thousand? 
	Uh oh!

effects.description:
Armour: +15 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%
Ability: "Don't Even Try It"

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: “Forget about da little stuff… we’s gonna get da biggest haul da tribes ever seen!”

effects.description:
Growth: +20
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: These gobbos have an air of superiority about them, using their rudimentary understanding of physics and engineering to expedite the tribe’s technological superiority. They’re very persnickety about getting their building projects just right though..

effects.description: Scrap: +1 per turn
Research rate: +5

Construction time: +20% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: “A bit o’ dis, a bit o’ dat, grab any o’ da metal fings and slap ‘em on.”

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using Tunnelling: +6%
Evasion chance when using Tunnelling: +16%
Evasion chance when using Tunnelling: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +10%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +20%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!
